entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cardston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cardston 08:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -19.1°C
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -23.0°C
Wind: SE 21 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the American border late this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the American border. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the American border in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 60 gusting to 80 early in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
